name: Wisdom of War
description: Wisdom of War is a real-time strategy game with unique style. Different from general real-time strategy game, the game only needs to operate a hero for various activities. This greatly reduces the demands for handsâ€™ operation speed in traditional real-time strategy game so that players can focus on strategy application.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
